## R Markdown

```{eviews mychunk,prompt=T,eval=TRUE,fig.cap="somefigure",fig.subcap=c("A figure","Another figure")}
#| fig.show: hold
#| echo: TRUE
#| fig.keep: new
#| graph_procs: 

wfcreate(wf=sagiru,page=mati) q 2000 2025
'open mychunk
delete gra*
genr y=@cumsum(nrnd)
genr x=@cumsum(nrnd)
genr z=@cumsum(nrnd)
genr date=@date
                     graph grap1.line z  
                           graph grap2.line z y x
   freeze(grap,mode=overwrite) x.line
equation ols.ls y c x

wfsave mychunk
```

```{r }
library(magrittr)

mychunk$ols

mychunk$series %>% head 
```
